item.Q:
Write the character:
to add; plus; abbr. for Canada 加拿大
item.A:
jīa
增加 zēngjīa to raise; to increase

item.Q:
Write the character:
water; river; surname
item.A:
shuǐ
水分 shuǐfèn moisture content

item.Q:
Write the character:
always; ever; often; frequently; common; general; constant; surname
item.A:
cháng
经常 (經常) jīngcháng day to day; everyday; daily; frequently; constantly; regularly; often

item.Q:
Write the character:
go through; know well; to connect; to communicate; open
item.A:
tōng
通过 (通過) tōngguò by means of; through; via; to adopt; to pass through; to get through; to switch over

item.Q:
Write the character:
a period of time; phase; stage; (used for issue of a periodical, courses of study); time; term; period; to hope
item.A:
qī
时期 (時期) shíqī a period in time or history; period; time (interval); phase

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: from; to obey; to observe; to follow; surname
2: lax; yielding; unhurried
item.A:
traditional: 從
1: cóng 2: cōng
从而 (從而) cóngér thus; thereby 从属 (從屬) cōngshǔ hypotaxis

item.Q:
Write the character:
eye; item; section; list; catalogue; table of contents; order (taxonomy); goal; name; title
item.A:
mù
目前 mùqián at the present time; currently

item.Q:
Write the character:
to check; to verify; to test; to examine; to take an exam
item.A:
kǎo
考虑 (考慮) kǎolǜ to think over; to consider; consideration

item.Q:
Write the character:
capacity; degree; standard
item.A:
dù
温度 (溫度) wēndù temperature

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: difficult (to...); problem; difficulty; difficult; not good
2: disaster; distress; to scold
item.A:
traditional: 難
1: nán 2: nàn
困难 (困難) kūnnán difficult 难民 (難民) nànmín refugee
